textBeforeTable: Very useful for low level builds. Strong leaping attack is effective in many situations. Does a lot of damage when upgraded with Lightning or Fire (which doesn't depend of stat scaling). Bleed build up is 30 per strike and once inflicted, does 30% of the enemies total HP General Information Sold by Undead Merchant (Male) in the Undead Burg for 350 Souls Availability A club with leather nailed to the pommel. The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy. Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the club is no longer dependably sturdy. textAfterTable: Fast running chop. Forward + R1 Kick. Useful for breaking guard. Forward + R2 Jumping overhead chop. L1 (left hand) Guard. L2 (left hand) Left-to-right horizontal swing. 2 Handed R1 Right-to-left horizontal swing. R2 — R2 Heavy overhead chop into overhead chop. Roll — R1 Fast overhead chop. Backstep or Run — R1 Fast running chop. Forward + R1 Kick. Useful for breaking guard. Forward + R2 Jumping overhead chop. L1 or L2 Guard Upgrades Fold Unfold Upgrades Basic Crystal Lightning Raw Magic Enchanted Divine Occult Fire Chaos Soul of Smough Basic Standard upgrade path. Requires Titanite Name Damage Stat
